text:
A New York doctor who put her life on the line to treat coronavirus patients has been denied her green card 

Dr. Julia Iafrate has been living here 13 yrs & is an assistant professor at Columbia University Medical Center

But Melania got an Einstein Visa https://t.co/f7ZOg8hBi4
